thread.title: Woman escapes man who said he'd stopped burglary at her home

title: Woman escapes man who said he'd stopped burglary at her home
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
When an 82-year-old woman saw a man leaving her home, he claimed he had scared off a burglar. As the two headed to the sheriff's department ...
